name: LootBots
description:
LootBots is a fun and challenging multiplayer shooter that has a twist. You need to open loot boxes to get weapons! Go out there and dismantle some robots!

When finding a match put the max searches to more than 1 or it will not find a match.

Discord: https://discord.gg/XJRJWar

Features

1.Multiplayer Hosting/Joining

2.Loot Box System

3.Teams (Duo/Squad)

4.Admin panel for server host

More Coming Soon

What's new?

1.Added lava/acid to bottom of world

2.Upgraded graphics to look cooler

(There is 1 glitch that we are working on where you sometimes are unable to join another match when you have hosted a match) if that happens please restart your game to fix :)
